thread.title: Brendon McCullum: Ricky Ponting was present when Chris Cairns approached
thread.title_full: Brendon McCullum: Ricky Ponting was present when Chris Cairns approached - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Brendon McCullum: Ricky Ponting was present when Chris Cairns approached
text:
*London:* Former Australia captain Ricky Ponting was present when New Zealand skipper Brendon McCullum received a " business proposition" from ex-Black Caps star Chris Cairns , he told a London court yesterday.
*Ricky Ponting*
Appearing at Cairns' perjury trial via video link from Australia, Ponting, 40, said that he had been ... Â»
